name: prop
description: Contains the properties of all share buttons Include, default: [ALL_BUTTONS]

name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Buttons order will be as you type it, default: [ALL_BUTTONS]

name: exclude
description: Exclude certain buttons, default: [ ]

name: theme
description: Set buttons theme name, default: null

name: title
description: Override title meta tag, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: redirectUrl
description: Override redirectUrl for Facebook Messenger, default: null

name: appId
description: Override appId for Facebook Messenger, default: null

name: gaTracking
description: Roll sharing stats automatically into your Google Analytics, default: false

name: twitterAccount
description: Add via @accountName at the end of the tweets, default: null

name: windowWidth
description: Share popup window width, default: 800

name: windowHeight
description: Share popup window height, default: 500

name: autoSetMeta
description: Initializes meta tags inputs from the SEO meta tags, default: true

name: size
description: Buttons default size, default: 0

name: moreButtonIcon
description: More button icon in ShareButtonsComponent, default: 'ellipsis-h'

name: lessButtonIcon
description: Less button icon in ShareButtonsComponent, default: 'minus'

name: sharerMethod
description: Set the method used to open the share window, either 'anchor' or 'window', default: 'anchor'

name: sharerTarget
description: Set the open share target, default: '_blank'

name: windowObj
description: Set the window object, used for Ionic to replace 'Window' with Cordova's 'InAppBrowser', works only when sharerMethod is 'window', default: Window

name: windowFuncName
description: Set the function name used to open the share window, default: 'open'
